name: Firebender
headline: Android Studio Coding Assistant
description:
Firebender is a free and privacy-first Android Studio AI assistant. 

One-click install from the IntelliJ plugin marketplace to your IDE. It has context over your codebase and lets you use the best models for asking questions, debugging code, and generating code snippets.

Unlike other AI assistants with outdated Android knowledge, Firebender continuously updates its knowledge base with the latest Android SDKs, libraries, and best practices, providing more accurate and relevant assistance for Android development.

founders.name: Aman Gottumukkala, Founder
founders.description:
Aman is the cofounder of Firebender, an AI-powered coding assistant built exclusively for Android Studio.

Before Firebender, Aman was a 2020 Kleiner Perkins Eng fellow and the 3rd engineer at Paradigm, where he built trading and internal data infrastructure from scratch, automated Ethereum derivative trading strategies yielding 20%, and published novel zero-knowledge cryptography research.

He interned at Google, Instagram, Twitch, and Microsoft in college.

founders.name: Kevin Tang, Co-founder
founders.description:
Previously, Kevin was a software engineer at Two Sigma where he architected and built service infrastructure for modeling, trading, and engineering teams (scale ~10K CPUs, ~1PB RAM). Kevin learned to program by creating Roblox games, one game had 2,000 concurrent players and featured on the front page.

Feel free to email/text/call him, and he's always down to play pickup basketball. He lives in NEMA near Market and Van Ness.

[![Firebender Logo](https://firebender.com/firebender-logo.svg)Download for free](https://firebender.com/<https:/plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/25224-firebender?noRedirect=true>)
# Most Powerful AI in Android Studio
### Become a 10x engineer with a [privacy first](https://firebender.com/</code-policy>), android centric coding assistant.
[![Firebender Logo](https://firebender.com/firebender-logo.svg)Download for free](https://firebender.com/<https:/plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/25224-firebender?noRedirect=true>)
# Trusted by android engineers at
![Rappi](https://firebender.com/rappi.svg)
![Henry Meds](https://firebender.com/_next/image?url=%2Fhenrymeds.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Vapi](https://firebender.com/_next/image?url=%2Fvapi.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Yassir](https://firebender.com/yassir.svg)
![DRiP](https://firebender.com/drip.svg)
![Emerge Tools](https://firebender.com/_next/image?url=%2Femergetools.webp&w=3840&q=75)
# Inline AI Changes
### Tell gpt-o1 or claude-3.5-sonnet to fix code directly in the editor. View or approve the git diff in one click.
# Understands Android Code
### Reference rendered app previews and files in your project, when writing code with AI.
# Loved by Android Developers
### We are grateful for the passionate community of android leaders willing to push the frontier of mobile development.
![](https://firebender.com/testimonials/benschwab.jpeg)
### Ben Schwab
Member of the Technical Staff at Anthropic (Ex Android Platform at Airbnb)
Firebender has become **my go-to AI tool** for Android development. Its AI-first editing experience, **combined with Android knowledge** , produces high-quality results in an ergonomic development environment in a way that I haven't found with other tools.
### Ryan Brooks
Android Lead, Emerge Tools (Ex Airbnb, MailChimp)
I've used lots of other AI dev tools, but all require me to use unfamiliar IDEs. **As an Android dev, I need to use Android Studio, and Firebender finally delivers the AI tooling I've been searching for directly in Android Studio**. It has drastically sped up my dev workflow!
![](https://firebender.com/testimonials/johnqualls.jpeg)
### John Qualls
Lead Android Engineer, Henry Meds (Ex Headspace, Twilio)
**This tool is so helpful!** It is so convenient to have all the latest LLMs right at your fingertips. It is the **Android equivalent of Cursor.sh** over in the web domain. Highly recommend folks use this as it's a game changer for day to day productivity
![](https://firebender.com/testimonials/pranay.jpeg)
### Pranay Airan
Android Tech Lead, Airbnb (Ex SoFi, Intuit), 10+ years of Industry Expertise
Firebender is amazing, it makes it so easy for me to build my personal apps and I can choose which model works best for me. With Firebender **I don't need to write boilerplate code anymore**.
![](https://firebender.com/testimonials/jordan.jpeg)
### Jordan Dearsley
CEO & Founder of VAPI
I hate Android development with a passion, it lags behind every other discipline in terms of developer support. I was dreading every moment working on our Android SDK until I stumbled upon Firebender. The product is useful, **the team is obsessed with the problem and responsive to support requests and delivers on requested features**. I can code now and it's not s***!!
![](https://firebender.com/testimonials/carlos.jpeg)
### Carlos Gabriel Salas Murillo
Android Developer, Rappi
If you'd love to boost your productivity by using Gen-AI, while enjoying a great coding experience with cool new features right in your Android Studio, **Firebender is the perfect fit for you**

generated_description:
### Firebender: Your Android Studio Coding Companion

**Overview**
Firebender is an innovative AI assistant designed specifically for Android Studio, launched in 2023 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W24. Based in San Francisco, this small but mighty startup, founded by Aman and Kevin, aims to revolutionize the way developers interact with Android coding. With a lean team of just two employees, they are laser-focused on enhancing the productivity of Android developers.

**Mission**
Firebender‚Äôs mission is clear: to provide a free, privacy-first AI assistant that understands the unique challenges of Android development. Unlike many other coding assistants that may offer outdated information, Firebender continually updates its knowledge base with the latest Android SDKs, libraries, and best practices. This means developers get accurate and relevant assistance tailored for their needs.

**Key Features**
- **One-Click Installation**: Easily integrate Firebender into your IDE through a simple download from the IntelliJ plugin marketplace.
- **Contextual Understanding**: Firebender has the capability to comprehend your codebase, which helps it provide precise guidance, debugging help, and code generation directly within Android Studio.
- **Real-Time AI Assistance**: The tool allows users to interact with sophisticated models like GPT-3 and Claude-3.5 to debug and generate code snippets seamlessly.
- **Latest Updates**: By maintaining an up-to-date knowledge base, Firebender ensures users are equipped with current best practices for Android development.

**User Testimonials**
Firebender has received glowing feedback from the Android developer community. For example, Ben Schwab from Anthropic reflects on how Firebender has become his go-to tool for Android development, praising its ergonomic environment. Similarly, Ryan Brooks from Emerge Tools notes the significant workflow improvements he's experienced since using Firebender. 

**Key Collaborations**
Firebender is already being trusted by some notable companies, including Rappi, Henry Meds, and VAPI, showcasing its effectiveness in real-world applications.

**Community and Support**
Firebender is committed to fostering a passionate community of Android developers eager to explore the frontiers of mobile development. They offer extensive documentation, a community forum for discussions, and prompt support for feedback and feature requests.

**How to Get Started**
Ready to become a 10x engineer? You can download Firebender for free from their [official website](https://firebender.com), and join the revolution in Android development. 

To sum it up, if you‚Äôre looking to supercharge your Android coding experience with AI, Firebender stands out as a leader dedicated to offering profound, up-to-date assistance right where you need it most‚Äîin your IDE. With a privacy-first approach and a commitment to continuous learning, Firebender might just be what you've been searching for.
